meanings.sent1: He felt drunker after drinking two beers.
meanings.sent2: She looked drunker than her friends at the party.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed drunker than the dog after lapping up spilled beer.
meanings.sent4: The stars appeared drunker as the night went on, twinkling more brightly.
meanings.sent5: The room spun around him, making him feel drunker than ever before.

meanings.sent1: He always ended up drunker than his friends at the bar.
meanings.sent2: She seemed drunker than anyone else at the party.
meanings.sent3: The clown looked even drunker than the juggling monkey at the circus.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed faster, appearing drunker than the winding road beside it.
meanings.sent5: The music blared loudly, making the atmosphere feel even drunker than before.
